metadataAttributes.Title: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Pursue your passion and improve your productivity. Learn how to use the best-in-class suite of apps that help you stay connected and get things done.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Create and maintain professional looking documents, Create and edit a workbook with multiple sheets, Represent data visually, Create and manage presentations, Describe the apps and services available in a Microsoft 365 subscription, Documents, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Chart, Worksheet, Microsoft PowerPoint, Presentation,
